messageDialog.messages.msgDefaultStageRe.message: This setting is not preserved on your account and needs to be set on every login.

By setting the resolution of a particular stream to a lower resolution than the current stage resolution, it's possible to stream multiple streams at the same time in different resolutions.[br][br]Hence, you can have one stream streaming at the default stage resolution and then set up another stream, forcing a smaller resolution than the default.[br][br]This setting is not preserved on your account and needs to be set on every login.

messageDialog.messages.msgLoginToServerE.message: Sorry. You need to be online to log in to XSplit.

Sorry. Your password is not recognized as valid on this computer. Please try to enter your password again. You may have changed your password for this account on a different computer or online. In this case we please ask you to make sure that your Internet is connected so the application may ensure that your password is in sync with the password we have registered on XSplit's server.

messageDialog.messages.msgGameComponentU.message: XSplit Broadcaster needs to restart itself in order to complete the Game Capture component update.

XSplit Broadcaster needs to update the Game Capture component, but an older component is currently loaded in system memory and prevents the update. Please restart your computer and run XSplit Broadcaster again.
XSplit Broadcaster detected an unusual behavior while loading its Game Capture component. Please retry once more, or restart your computer to reset the system memory.
XSplit Broadcaster needs to update the Game Capture component, but cannot proceed while XSplit Gamecaster is running. If you proceed, XSplit Gamecaster will be terminated. Do you want to continue?
XSplit Broadcaster needs to update the Game Capture component, but cannot proceed while XSplit Gamecaster is running. Please close XSplit Gamecaster and run XSplit Broadcaster again.
